ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:0.5_0: 2. The training rule on the hair of the private parts
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.2_0: At that time the nuns from the group of six removed the hair from their private parts. They then bathed naked together with prostitutes at a ford in the river Aciravatī.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.3_0: The prostitutes complained and criticized them,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.4_0: “How can the nuns remove the hair from their private parts? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.5_0: The nuns heard the complaints of those prostitutes,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.6_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.7_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six remove the hair from their private parts?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.8_0: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns did that?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.11_0: “How can the nuns from the group of six remove the hair from their private parts?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.12_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.13_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:1.14.1_0: ‘If a nun removes hair from her private parts, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.8_0: if she removes one hair, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.9_0: Even if she removes many hairs, she commits one offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.13_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc2:2.14_0: The second rule, the second training rule on fire, is finished.
